item.description:
For people who dont want to have lunch alone. Interested in food,and meet friends. gives everyone an opportunity to come and make new friends, practice their Chinese or English, and enjoy lunch with us. Bring your friends, and come by, relax, practice in either language of your choice, and enjoy being part of our growing community.

We look forward to seeing you there! We gonna be there from 12:30 pm to 1:30pm

I wont be there if nobody RSVP yes.

I will only wait 15 mins past the hour before ordering my food.

Take C line to washington sq. or take bus 66.



for more info. please check
http://cityvoter.com/...
item.how_to_find_us: please give me a call when you arrive, 617-506-9136

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Lunch table in brookline
